Package edu.uw.pce.advjava.db

Class DerbyUtils

java.lang.Object
edu.uw.pce.advjava.db.DerbyUtils
public class DerbyUtils extends Object
Database utilities specific to Derby.
Author:
Russ Moul

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_PORT

      public static final int DEFAULT_PORT
      Derby's default port.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • dumpDb

      public static void dumpDb(Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Dumps the contents of all user tables to the console. Appropriate for debugging very small databases.
      Parameters:
      conn - the database connection
      Throws:
      SQLException - if SQL errors are encountered

    • composeUrl

      public static final String composeUrl(String hostname, int port, String dbName, boolean inMemory)
      Composes a Derby database URL string. The provided URL is for a non-embedded connection.
      Parameters:
      hostname - the server host name
      port - the port number, may use DerbyUtils.DEFAULT_PORT
      dbName - the database name
      inMemory - true indicates use of an in-memory database
      Returns:
      the URL string
